message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $8,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11,500. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000 and my initial offer was $12,000.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $11,000. I'm willing to make a small concession and sell the product to you for $11,250. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000 and my initial offer was $12,000.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,125 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $11,125. I'm willing to make a small concession and sell the product to you for $11,200. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000 and my initial offer was $12,000.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,150 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $11,150. I'm willing to make a small concession and sell the product to you for $11,175. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000 and my initial offer was $12,000.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,125 for the product.
